Item.NAME: Beagle
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY WEIGHT
Item.COPY: The calorie content of the BEAGLE ADULT formula is optimized to help these eager eaters maintain an ideal weight.

Item.NAME: Beagle
Item.HEADLINE: JOINT SUPPORT
Item.COPY: His sturdy and compact body, combined with his natural tendency to put on weight, are among the factors that can put stress on his joints. The BEAGLE ADULT formula helps support healthy bones and joints with EPA & DHA, plus glucosamine and chondroitin.

Item.NAME: Beagle
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Exclusive kibble shape is designed to encourage chewing and slow down the rate of ingestion for these voracious eaters.

Item.NAME: Bulldog
Item.HEADLINE: ODOR REDUCTION
Item.COPY: The BULLDOG ADULT formula uses highly digestible proteins, precise levels of fiber and high quality carbohydrate sources to help reduce intestinal fermentation, which can lead to digestive disorders, flatulence and unpleasant stool odor.

Item.NAME: Bulldog
Item.HEADLINE: BONE AND JOINT HEALTH
Item.COPY: The Bulldog's heavy structure can put stress on its joints. The BULLDOG ADULT formula helps support healthy bones and joints with EPA & DHA, plus glucosamine and chondroitin.

Item.NAME: Bulldog
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: BULLDOG ADULT kibble is uniquely shaped to be easier for short muzzles to grasp and chew.

Item.NAME: Bulldog
Item.HEADLINE: PUPPY
Item.COPY: Also available in BULLDOG PUPPY formula.

Item.NAME: Chihuahua
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: Chihuahuas can be picky eaters, judging both the smell and taste of food. Formulas include natural flavors and aromas to appeal to finicky appetites.

Item.NAME: Chihuahua
Item.HEADLINE: STOOL AND ODOR REDUCTION
Item.COPY: Highly digestible proteins, optimum fiber levels and high quality carbohydrates help reduce stool odor and amount.

Item.NAME: Chihuahua
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The size, shape and density of the kibble is specially developed for the small and fragile jaw of the Chihuahua.

Item.NAME: Chihuahua
Item.HEADLINE: PUPPY
Item.COPY: Also available in CHIHUAHUA PUPPY formula.

Item.NAME: German Shepherd
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE PERFORMANCE
Item.COPY: Because of his physiology, the German Shepherd can suffer from digestive sensitivity and poor stool quality. GERMAN SHEPHERD ADULT supports the breed’s more delicate digestive system with highly digestible proteins and a specific combination of fibers.

Item.NAME: German Shepherd
Item.HEADLINE: BONE AND JOINT HEALTH
Item.COPY: The GERMAN SHEPHERD ADULT formula helps support their working bones and joints with Glucosamine, Chondroitin, EPA & DHA.

Item.NAME: German Shepherd
Item.HEADLINE: SKIN HEALTH
Item.COPY: GERMAN SHEPHERD ADULT helps support the skin’s role as a barrier with an exclusive complex that includes EPA & DHA and Vitamin A.

Item.NAME: German Shepherd
Item.HEADLINE: PUPPY
Item.COPY: Also available in GERMAN SHEPHERD PUPPY formula.

Item.NAME: German Shepherd
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The GERMAN SHEPHERD ADULT kibble is designed to help slow the rate of ingestion by encouraging the dog to chew.

Item.NAME: Labrador Retriever
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY WEIGHT
Item.COPY: The Labrador Retriever’s appetite requires a carefully controlled diet to avoid becoming overweight. The LABRADOR RETRIEVER ADULT formula helps maintain the dog’s ideal weight with an appropriate calorie content.

Item.NAME: Labrador Retriever
Item.HEADLINE: BONE AND JOINT HEALTH
Item.COPY: The Labrador’s solid body and strong bones are factors that can put stress on his joints. LABRADOR RETRIEVER ADULT formula contains supplemental levels of glucosamine and chondroitin, along with precise levels of calcium and phosphorous, to help support healthy bones and joints.

Item.NAME: Labrador Retriever
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: LABRADOR RETRIEVER ADULT formula kibble is designed to reduce the rate of food intake, which helps prevent gulping and encourages chewing.

Item.NAME: Labrador Retriever
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY SKIN AND COAT
Item.COPY: The LABRADOR RETRIEVER ADULT formula helps support the skin’s role as a barrier with an exclusive complex of nutrients and helps maintain skin and coat health (EPA and DHA).

Item.NAME: Labrador Retriever
Item.HEADLINE: PUPPY
Item.COPY: Also available in LABRADOR RETRIEVER PUPPY formula.

Item.NAME: Shih Tzu
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The specially designed “L-shaped kibble” is easier for the brachycephalic (short muzzle) Shih Tzu to grasp and encourages chewing.

Item.NAME: Shih Tzu
Item.HEADLINE: COAT HEALTH
Item.COPY: Shih Tzus are recognized for their beautiful, flowing coats that grow continuously. SHIH TZU ADULT helps maintain the unique coat of this breed with Omega 3 & 6 fatty acids and biotin.

Item.NAME: Shih Tzu
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE HEALTH
Item.COPY: Formulated with highly digestible proteins, plus a balance of soluble and insoluble fibers, to improve digestion and help reduce stool odor and volume.

Item.NAME: Shih Tzu
Item.HEADLINE: PUPPY
Item.COPY: Also available in SHIH TZU PUPPY formula.

Item.NAME: West Highland Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The kibble’s size, shape and texture is specially designed for the West Highland White Terrier to make it easier to grasp and encourages chewing.

Item.NAME: West Highland Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY COAT
Item.COPY: Compared to other breeds, West Highland Terriers have a rough coat and delicate skin. This formula contains specific amino acids to support hair growth, plus fatty acids and flax seeds to support skin health.

Item.NAME: West Highland Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: Many West Highland Terriers are picky eaters. The formula is designed with exceptional flavors and aromas to satisfy and appeal to their finicky appetites.

Item.NAME: West Highland Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: SKIN HEALTH
Item.COPY: West Highland Terriers can have a more delicate skin than other breeds. This formula contains particular nutrients, including EPA & DHA, to help support the skin’s role as a natural barrier and to keep skin healthy.

Item.NAME: Yorkshire Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: YORKSHIRE TERRIER ADULT formula includes natural flavors and aromas designed to appeal to a Yorkshire Terrier’s finicky appetite.

Item.NAME: Yorkshire Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: SILKY COAT CARE
Item.COPY: A Yorkshire Terrier’s coat grows in single strands without an undercoat. Omega 3 & 6 fatty acids and biotin help to support their unique silky coat and keep it healthy.

Item.NAME: Yorkshire Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: ATTENTION TO AGING
Item.COPY: The Yorkshire Terrier is known to have a long life expectancy. YORKSHIRE TERRIER ADULT is formulated with antioxidants to help maintain healthy cells and support healthy aging.

Item.NAME: Yorkshire Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: PUPPY
Item.COPY: Also available in YORKSHIRE TERRIER PUPPY formula.

Item.NAME: Yorkshire Terrier
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The YORKSHIRE TERRIER ADULT formula kibble has a size, shape and texture that makes it easier for the Yorkshire Terrier to grasp and encourages chewing.

Item.NAME: X-SMALL
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Kibble is extra small in size and designed for the miniature jaw of dogs less than 8 pounds.

Item.NAME: X-SMALL
Item.HEADLINE: TARGETED ENERGY CONTENT
Item.COPY: X-SMALL formulas support the high energy needs of very small dogs by adapting nutrients through each life stage.

Item.NAME: X-SMALL
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY DIGESTION
Item.COPY: Highly digestible proteins and precise levels of select fibers help to regulate and ease intestinal transit.

Item.NAME: X-SMALL
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: Formulas include natural flavors and aromas to appeal to very small dogs with picky appetites.

Item.NAME: MINI
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Small kibble, ideal for delicate teeth, also creates a brushing effect during chewing to help reduce the formation of plaque.

Item.NAME: MINI
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE HEALTH
Item.COPY: MINI INDOOR formulas are developed with highly digestible proteins, optimal fiber levels and high quality carbohydrates to help support healthy digestion and reduce stool odor and volume.

Item.NAME: MINI
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY COAT
Item.COPY: MINI formulas have adapted levels of EPA and DHA to help support a beautiful coat and healthy skin.

Item.NAME: MINI
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: Formulas include natural flavors and aromas to appeal to small dogs with picky appetites.

Item.NAME: MEDIUM
Item.HEADLINE: HIGH DIGESTIBILITY
Item.COPY: Formulas help promote good digestibility with very high quality proteins and precise levels of fibers.

Item.NAME: MEDIUM
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: Satisfies the appetites of medium breed dogs with carefully selected aromas.

Item.NAME: MEDIUM
Item.HEADLINE: NATURAL DEFENSES
Item.COPY: Formulas support a medium-sized dog’s natural defenses with an antioxidant complex and prebiotics.

Item.NAME: MEDIUM
Item.HEADLINE: COAT HEALTH
Item.COPY: Formulas containing nutrients that help support healthy skin and coat.

Item.NAME: MAXI
Item.HEADLINE: BONE AND JOINT SUPPORT
Item.COPY: Formulas include precise blends of nutrients to support the large breed dog’s bones and joints through each life-stage.

Item.NAME: MAXI
Item.HEADLINE: HIGHLY PALATABLE
Item.COPY: Satisfies the appetite of large breed dogs with carefully selected aromas.

Item.NAME: MAXI
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY COAT
Item.COPY: MAXI formulas have adapted levels of EPA and DHA to help support a beautiful coat and healthy skin.

Item.NAME: MAXI
Item.HEADLINE: HIGH DIGESTIBILITY
Item.COPY: MAXI Formulas help promote healthy digestion with high quality proteins and precise levels of fibers.

Item.NAME: GIANT
Item.HEADLINE: BONE & JOINT SUPPORT
Item.COPY: Formulas include precise blends of nutrients to support a Giant-sized dog’s bones and joints through each life-stage.

Item.NAME: GIANT
Item.HEADLINE: HIGH DIGESTIBILITY
Item.COPY: GIANT Formulas help promote good digestibility with high quality proteins and precise levels of fibers.

Item.NAME: GIANT
Item.HEADLINE: NATURAL DEFENSES
Item.COPY: Formulas support a Giant-sized dog’s natural defenses with an antioxidant complex and mannan oligosaccharides.

Item.NAME: URBAN
Item.HEADLINE: SUPPORTS CHANGING ENVIRONMENTS
Item.COPY: Urban dogs experience crowds, traffic and noise daily, and they may be exposed to the effects of oxidation resulting from a polluted environment. URBAN LIFE formulas include specific nutrients from fish (polypeptides) to help support cellular health.

Item.NAME: URBAN
Item.HEADLINE: VIVACITY
Item.COPY: URBAN LIFE formulas contain nutrients to support healthy brain function and awareness in busy, changing environments.

Item.NAME: URBAN
Item.HEADLINE: EVERY LIFESTAGE
Item.COPY: The URBAN LIFE range includes formulas for puppies, adult dogs and maturing dogs. And includes options for small dogs up to 22 lbs. and large dogs weighing over 23 lbs.

Item.NAME: URBAN
Item.HEADLINE: EASILY BREAKABLE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The unique shape, texture and size of URBAN LIFE formula kibbles make it easy to grasp and crunch, thus encouraging chewing for dogs of different sizes.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE HEALTH
Item.COPY: INDOOR formulas contain highly digestible proteins, precise levels of fibers and high quality carbohydrate sources to help support digestive health and reduce fecal smell and volume.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: IDEAL BODY CONDITION
Item.COPY: Indoor dogs tend to be less active and excess weight can affect their health. The INDOOR LIFE formulas help support a healthy body condition with a precise calorie content for the reduced energy needs of small dogs.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: SKIN & COAT HEALTH
Item.COPY: The INDOOR LIFE formulas contains nutrients, including Omega 3 fatty acids (EPA and DHA), to help support a healthy skin and coat.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: EVERY LIFESTAGE
Item.COPY: The INDOOR LIFE range includes formulas for small puppies, adult dogs and maturing dogs weighing up to 22 lbs.

Item.NAME: SPORTING
Item.HEADLINE: SPORT PERFORMANCE
Item.COPY: “Sport Performance +” is an exclusive combination of nutrients that helps maintain healthy joints with glucosamine and chondroitin, supports a healthy digestive system with highly digestible proteins and specific fibers, and helps neutralize free radicals with a patented cocktail of antioxidants and beta carotene.

Item.NAME: SPORTING
Item.HEADLINE: ENERGY
Item.COPY: Royal Canin SPORTING LIFE AGILITY 4100 contains high level of carbohydrates (42% min) to provide energy that can be quickly used to maximize performance of sporting dogs during short periods of intense activity.

Item.NAME: SPORTING
Item.HEADLINE: CONTINUAL ENERGY
Item.COPY: Royal Canin SPORTING LIFE TRAIL 4300 contains a balanced level of carbohydrates (29% min) and fatty acids (19% min). Carbohydrates provide energy which can be used quickly at the beginning of the physical effort, while fatty acids are used gradually over the exercise period to maximize performance of sporting dogs with long periods of sustained activity.

Item.NAME: SPORTING
Item.HEADLINE: EXTENDED ENERGY
Item.COPY: Royal Canin SPORTING LIFE ENDURANCE 4800 contains a high level of fatty acids (28% min) to provide a high level of energy that can be used gradually over the endurance effort to maximize performance of sporting and working dogs with very long periods of sustained activity.

Item.NAME: SPORTING
Item.HEADLINE: MUSCLE CONDITION
Item.COPY: Due to a high level of protein, SPORTING LIFE formulas support oxygen delivery to muscles and helps maintain muscle mass.
